titles.title: ACRE Act of 2023
Access to Credit for our Rural Economy Act of 2023
ACRE Act of 2023
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income interest received on certain loans secured by rural or agricultural real property.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Access to Credit for our Rural Economy Act of 2023 or the ACRE Act of 2023
This bill excludes from the gross income of certain financial lending institutions, for income tax purposes, interest received on loans secured by rural or agricultural real estate.
